name: Rewind (itch) (Ado, Jerzyk, mruk, Ashentar)
description:
Game about the past and its iconic themes. We got the oldschool music, the gear and whole lotta time to control - only to stay in the 90's forever.

Michał 'Ashen' Stawicki - Design, Level Design, Programming, Animation, Cool Features

Maciej 'Mruk' Rudnicki - Design, Art

Adrian 'Ado' Szymczykiewicz - Design, Programming, Music & SFX, Animation

Michał 'Jerzyk' Sobczak - Design, Level design
